Finalmente un restaurante que est√° a la altura en Washington heights.   La comida excelente y el servicio impecable.   A pesar que vine por la promoci√≥n que hacen en Instagram por su men√∫ de $6 d√≥lares durante happy hour, decid√≠ tratar un plato fuerte,  el pescado relleno lo recomiendo 10/10.

I really truly love this. Been here a few times and there happy hour is literally the best happy hour anywhere in the city. The drinks always taste amazing. There appetizers are great. This place is one of few I been to in yearssssss that truly can make calamari it hard to find a place that didn't over cook it or make it chewy it literally melts in your mouth. The hookah was great too. I didn't have any complaints or issues anytime I went here.

Such a fun place!! The team is great, the music is mostly latin and there‚Äôs plenty of room to dance. They also serve hookah separate from drinks/food and I‚Äôve had a blast every time. The mezzanine ends up being more private, and there‚Äôs also bar seating if you‚Äôre looking to be more social!

We had an outstanding experience here. The food was delicious, the atmosphere was bright and fun ‚Äî and the service was great. Had an incredibly tasty (and creative) seafood dish. Margaritas were also on point.

Just wish it was more full. Let‚Äôs rally and keep this great restaurant going!!!

The restaurant is beautiful and a great place to spend time with friends, thanks to its cozy atmosphere and stylish decor. Some of the food was really good, and the staff were good, friendly, and attentive throughout our visit. However, the mofongo de chicharr√≥n was disappointing, as it had too much fat and lacked balance in flavor. Despite that, the overall experience was positive, and I still recommend the place for its ambiance and service.

El restaurante es hermoso y un excelente lugar para pasar tiempo con amigos, gracias a su ambiente acogedor y su decoraci√≥n con estilo. Algunos de los platos estaban muy buenos, y el personal fue incre√≠ble: amable y atento durante toda nuestra visita. Sin embargo, el mofongo de chicharr√≥n fue decepcionante, ya que ten√≠a demasiada grasa y un sabor poco equilibrado. A pesar de eso, la experiencia en general fue positiva y a√∫n as√≠ recomiendo el lugar por su ambiente y atenci√≥n.
Great service! The staff are very friendly and attentive. The drinks and food were delicious.

Service was good and atmosphere good. Drinks were strong (but didn‚Äôt taste good) if that makes sense. All drinks tasted like pure rubbing alcohol which some may appreciate but I didn‚Äôt. Good also ‚Äúmeh‚Äù nothing to talk about.

I came here for the happy hour Luis was our waiter poor guy was attending so many tables at once and providing the best he could with customer service he was amazing, however, I will rate the place a 7/10 the food was good but it took over one hour and a half to come out the drink were okay they should be a little stronger.

First time customer, came to celebrate Valentines Day with my mom. Server was super nice, host + music (DJ) was good.

Ordered calamari and rocking shrimp. Calamari were good, shrimp not so good. Didn‚Äôt taste fresh and they were a bit on the hard side.

Waited more than 45 minutes for my for our main entree, which was understandable because it was a busy night. However, I ordered the stuffed Salmon with crabmeat + shrimp (under the special) sauce on the side and fried rice. Being that I don‚Äôt eat meat, I asked the server to ensure that it was plain fried rice, in which she ensured that was the case. That wasn‚Äôt the case. Sauce came right on top and I think the rice had pieces of chicken. Left eating mash potatoes. Was definitely disappointed. No bueno.

Regardless of the situation whether it was a error on the server or chef, with 15years + in the hospitality industry and spending over $125, would have been nice at least for the manager to swing by the table.
Wow, no tengo palabras para describir lo bello que es este lugar, la comida es increible y su happy hour es lo mejor que he visto.   Un menu que contiene tragos y bebidas a solo $6 dolares.
Beautiful place, food exceeded my expectations and loved it! Drinks were amazing as well. Can't wait to return nxt week!
The food is amazing.the sushi was great .. steak n eggs on point.. Chef Nelson is the truth .. Best Sunday Brunch hands down . Jonas great bartender tell him Flow sent you.. lol Enjoy üòâ

Went last night w family for happy hour, they have a new power $6 menu where appetizers & drinks & even your first hookah is $6 absolutely amazing a whole vibe, just wish the drinks were a little stronger & my server was more atent, it was her first day so i will give her grace, but i definitely recommend & will be coming back

Went there for happy hour yesterday afternoon with 2 friends. The host offered a table right away. Food was good and pretty affordable for today's economy. We had tacos, chicken wings, croquetas de pollo and soft mofongo. Drinks were right on point. We had Cosmopolitans and a Mojito. For dessert, we had a flan and a 3 leches cake. Very well presented and delicious. Service is excellent. Our server, Francisco, deserves 5 stars. Our only complaint- and the reason why I'm giving an overall 4 stars rating- is that the music was a little too loud and we found ourselves almost screaming across the table in order to have a conversation.
I love it !!! Excellent food, excellent service and very fun to hang out!!! Ill definitely be back soon
Best place in Washington high with the Happy Hour $6. All day Week.
